title: Impact of heavy metals (Cu, Fe, Pb, Zn) on carbon and nitrogen uptake of the diatom-bearing benthic foraminifera Heterostegina depressa
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Mario Bubl, Petra Heinz, Wolfgang Wanek, Michael Schagerl, Thilo Hofmann, Michael Lintner
